887     *   <li>If any Stores are specified, the Customer can only log in using the Password Flow for Customers in a Store for those specific Stores.</li>
888     *  </ul>

890     */

901     *  </ul>

910    /**
911     * builds CustomerDraft with checking for non-null required values
912     * @return CustomerDraft
913     */
914    public CustomerDraft build() {
915        Objects.requireNonNull(email, CustomerDraft.class + ": email is missing");
916        return new CustomerDraftImpl(key, customerNumber, externalId, email, password, firstName, lastName, middleName,
917            title, anonymousCartId, anonymousCart, anonymousId, dateOfBirth, companyName, vatId, addresses,
918            defaultShippingAddress, shippingAddresses, defaultBillingAddress, billingAddresses, isEmailVerified,
919            customerGroup, custom, locale, salutation, stores, authenticationMode);
920    }
921
922    /**
923     * builds CustomerDraft without checking for non-null required values
924     * @return CustomerDraft
925     */
926    public CustomerDraft buildUnchecked() {
927        return new CustomerDraftImpl(key, customerNumber, externalId, email, password, firstName, lastName, middleName,
928            title, anonymousCartId, anonymousCart, anonymousId, dateOfBirth, companyName, vatId, addresses,
929            defaultShippingAddress, shippingAddresses, defaultBillingAddress, billingAddresses, isEmailVerified,
930            customerGroup, custom, locale, salutation, stores, authenticationMode);
931    }

933    /**
934     * factory method for an instance of CustomerDraftBuilder
935     * @return builder
936     */
937    public static CustomerDraftBuilder of() {
938        return new CustomerDraftBuilder();
939    }
940
941    /**
942     * create builder for CustomerDraft instance
943     * @param template instance with prefilled values for the builder
944     * @return builder
945     */
946    public static CustomerDraftBuilder of(final CustomerDraft template) {
947        CustomerDraftBuilder builder = new CustomerDraftBuilder();
948        builder.key = template.getKey();
949        builder.customerNumber = template.getCustomerNumber();
950        builder.externalId = template.getExternalId();
951        builder.email = template.getEmail();
952        builder.password = template.getPassword();
953        builder.firstName = template.getFirstName();
954        builder.lastName = template.getLastName();
955        builder.middleName = template.getMiddleName();
956        builder.title = template.getTitle();
957        builder.anonymousCartId = template.getAnonymousCartId();
958        builder.anonymousCart = template.getAnonymousCart();
959        builder.anonymousId = template.getAnonymousId();
960        builder.dateOfBirth = template.getDateOfBirth();
961        builder.companyName = template.getCompanyName();
962        builder.vatId = template.getVatId();
963        builder.addresses = template.getAddresses();
964        builder.defaultShippingAddress = template.getDefaultShippingAddress();
965        builder.shippingAddresses = template.getShippingAddresses();
966        builder.defaultBillingAddress = template.getDefaultBillingAddress();
967        builder.billingAddresses = template.getBillingAddresses();
968        builder.isEmailVerified = template.getIsEmailVerified();
969        builder.customerGroup = template.getCustomerGroup();
970        builder.custom = template.getCustom();
971        builder.locale = template.getLocale();
972        builder.salutation = template.getSalutation();
973        builder.stores = template.getStores();
974        builder.authenticationMode = template.getAuthenticationMode();
975        return builder;
976    }
